import {React, useState} from 'react' import Pic from '../assets/Tiger.jpg' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' const CardDetailItem = ({show, close, data}) => { const [location, setLocation] = useState() const handleLocationChange = (e) => { setLocation(e.target.value) } const addLocation = () => { const existingLocation = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(location)) || [] for (const location in existingLocation) { console.log(location) } // existingLocation.push(data.name) // localStorage.setItem(location, JSON.stringify(existingLocation)) close() } return ( Detail Character

{data.name}

Status : Alive

Species : Human

Location : Earth (Replacement Dimension)

 ) } export default CardDetailItem
